title: 02/02/22 DPS Best Of
itunes:title: 02/02/22 DPS Best Of
description:
On Today's Dan Patrick Show, DP talks to Mike Florio walks us through the Brian Flores lawsuit. Pro Football Focus' Steve Palazzolo explains why their numbers have Tom Brady as the Most Valuable Player since 2018. Seton checks in from Memphis Tennessee. And new Las Vegas Raiders Head Coach shares a statement with us to confirm that he's officially a part of Raiders Nation.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
On Today's Dan Patrick Show, DP talks to Mike Florio walks us through the Brian Flores lawsuit. Pro Football Focus' Steve Palazzolo explains why their numbers have Tom Brady as the Most Valuable Player since 2018. Seton checks in from Memphis Tennessee. And new Las Vegas Raiders Head Coach shares a statement with us to confirm that he's officially a part of Raiders Nation.
